Uses of Interface
org.apache.http.conn.scheme.SchemeSocketFactory

Packages that use SchemeSocketFactory
org.apache.http.conn.scheme Scheme class represents a protocol scheme such as "http" or "https" and contains a number of protocol properties such as the default port and the socket factory to be used to creating Sockets for the given protocol 
org.apache.http.conn.ssl TLS/SSL specific API. 
 

Uses of SchemeSocketFactory in org.apache.http.conn.scheme
 

Subinterfaces of SchemeSocketFactory in org.apache.http.conn.scheme
 interface LayeredSchemeSocketFactory
          A SocketFactory for layered sockets (SSL/TLS).
 

Classes in org.apache.http.conn.scheme that implement SchemeSocketFactory
 class PlainSocketFactory
          The default class for creating plain (unencrypted) sockets.
 

Methods in org.apache.http.conn.scheme that return SchemeSocketFactory

          Obtains the socket factory.
 

Constructors in org.apache.http.conn.scheme with parameters of type SchemeSocketFactory

          Creates a new scheme.
